column2: "Na nda yi mu no a esuafo no dodow rodɔɔ so no
column3: ehwinhwin baa Helenifo no mu tsiaa Hebriwfo no
column4: osiandɛ wobuu hɔn enyi guu hɔn ekunafo do wɔ daadaa som no mu."

column2: "Na duebien no frɛɛ esuafo kuw no nyina baa hɔn nkyɛn
column4: Ɔmmfata dɛ hɛn yɛbɛdan Nyankopɔn asɛm egya
hom nhwehwɛ hom mu mbarimba beesuon a wɔwɔ dzin pa a Sunsum nye nyansa ahyɛ hɔn ma
column5: na yenyi hɔn nsi edwuma yi do."

column3: yɛbɔkɔ do araa esuo mpaabɔ nye nyamesɛm no som mu dzen."

column2: "Na asɛm no sɔɔ dɔm no nyina enyi; na woyii Stefen
column3: ɔbarimba a gyedzi nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn ahyɛ no ma
column9: nye Nikolas a ofi Antiok a ɔadan Jewnyi no;"

column2: "hɔn na wɔdze hɔn gyinaa asomafo no enyim
column3: na wɔbɔɔ mpaa dze hɔn nsa guu hɔn do."
na esuafo no dodow yɛɛ pii wɔ Jerusalɛm
column4: na asɔfo no so hɔn mu okuw kɛsenara yɛɛ setsie maa gyedzi no."

column2: "Na Stefen a adom nye ahoɔdzen ahyɛ no ma no
column3: yɛɛ anwanwadze nye asɛnkyerɛdze akɛse wɔ ɔman no mu."

column2: "Na binom a wofi nhyiamudan a nna wɔfrɛ no Fahodzifo Hyiadan nye Sirenefo nye Alɛksandriafo nye hɔn a wofi Silisia nye Asia dze no mu soɛree
"Na woenntum enngyina nyansa nye Sunsum a ɔdze kasae no ano."
"Nna wɔhyɛɛ nyimpa bi tsipia ma wɔsee dɛ
column3: Yɛatse dɛ ɔka ebususɛm tsia Moses nye Nyankopɔn."

column4: ma wɔbaa no do bɛkyeer no dze no kɔr bagua mu;"

column2: "na wɔdze adasefo atorfo begyinaa hɔ a wɔsee dɛ
column3: Nyimpa yi nngyaa dɛ ɔkasa tsia krɔnkrɔnbea yi nye mbra no."

column2: "Na yɛatse dɛ ɔka dɛ Jesus Nazarɛtnyi no bobutuw bea yi
column3: na ɔasakyer amambra a Moses dze maa hɛn no."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔtse bagua mu hɔ nyina dze hɔn enyiwa tsiim no do no
column3: wohun n'enyim dɛ ɔtse dɛ sor abɔfo enyim."
